data.content: Read the options given below. Click on Answer This to choose one of the following options

content.name: Who are your friends? What do you like to do with your friends?
content.quesionTranscript: Who are your friends? What do you like to do with your friends?
content.modelAnsTranscript: My friends are Ashwin and John. I like to play football with them.
content.instructions:
• Listen to the model conversation below.
  • Discuss with your partner,choose a role and create a dialogue for the chosen option.
  • You can also use the words and phrases from the word cloud on your screen to create your dialogue.
  • After you have practised,click 'Record'.
  • If you want to hear your recording, click on the play button.
  • If you are happy with your recording, click on 'Save File'.

content.name: Are animals your friends? Do you like to play with animals?
content.quesionTranscript: Are animals your friends? Do you like to play with animals?
content.modelAnsTranscript: A: Yes, animals are my friends. I like to play with cats.</br>B: No, animals are not my friends. I am scared of buffaloes and dogs.

content.name: If you are in a new school, how will you make friends?
content.quesionTranscript: If you are in a new school, how will you make friends?
content.modelAnsTranscript: A: I will ask some kind boy to make friends with me. I will join in the games.B: I will ask my teacher to introduce me to some girls. Then I will start talking.
